name: Luzones
declaringWar: Your people have agitated the spirits for too long!
attacked: With the power of Maycapal, I will smite you!
defeated: We may have lost this battle, but our spirit cannot be defeated.
introduction: Welcome to our lands. We are the Luzones, a people of strength and courage. If commerce is what you seek, then you've come to the right place.
neutralHello: Welcome. We are open to diplomatic relations with all who come in peace.
hateHello: You have upsetted the spirits. Begone.
tradeRequest: I have something that may interest you, foreigner, in exchange for...

name: Caboloan
declaringWar: I regret to inform you that Caboloan can no longer tolerate your presence. We declare war on your civilization.
attacked: We will not be intimidated by your aggression. Caboloan will fight back with all our might.
defeated: We have fought bravely, but the time has come for Caboloan to accept defeat. May we learn from this experience and grow stronger in the future.
introduction: Hail, I am Princess Urduja, leader of Caboloan. May our interactions be respectful and productive.
neutralHello: Welcome to our lands. I am Princess Urduja, ruler of the Caboloan civilization. May our meeting be fruitful and peaceful.
hateHello: I have heard of your treachery, and I will not stand for it. You will face the wrath of Tawalisi and its fierce warriors. I am Princess Urduja, and you will remember that name.
tradeRequest: We believe that a trade agreement would be mutually beneficial for Caboloan and your civilization. Would you be interested in discussing further?
uniques: [+1 Production, +1 Science] from each Trade Route
[+20]% Production when constructing [Water] units [in all cities]

name: Ibalon
declaringWar: Our people will not back down from a fight. Prepare for battle!
attacked: We will defend ourselves against any aggression. You will not defeat us!
defeated: Though we have been defeated, the spirit of the Ibalon people lives on. We will rise again!
introduction: Magandang araw! I am Bantong, the leader of the Ibalon civilization. Our people are known for our bravery and resilience in the face of adversity. Let us work together to build a prosperous and powerful civilization.
neutralHello: Maayong adlaw! Greetings, friend. I hope our peoples can coexist peacefully and prosperously.
hateHello: You are an enemy of the Ibalon people, and we will not hesitate to defend ourselves against your aggression.
tradeRequest: Would you be interested in a trade agreement between our civilizations? Our goods are of the highest quality.

name: Madya-as Confederation
declaringWar: Our people will not stand idly by while you threaten our sovereignty. We declare war!
attacked: We will not cower before your threats. We will fight to defend our homes and our families!
defeated: Though we have fallen in battle, our spirit remains unbroken. We will rise again to defend our lands and our people.
introduction: Welcome to our lands. I am Datu Sumakwel, ruler of the Madya-as Confederation. What brings you here?
neutralHello: Hello. We hope that our paths cross without conflict.
hateHello: Your actions have earned our enmity. We will not tolerate your presence here.
tradeRequest: We are open to trade, but only if the terms are fair and just.
uniques: [+1 Production, +1 Food] per [3] population [in all cities]

name: Sugbu
uniques: [+15]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>
Cities are razed [2] times as fast

name: Manguindanao
declaringWar: It is not my wish to conquer your realm by force, but we arrive at a point now where there is no alternative.
attacked: Here come a bunch of armed men waving around and shouting. Should I let this behaviour be?
defeated: The road ahead is dark, the surrounding pines are dense like walls, the sky and earth are full dark.
introduction: Welcome, stranger. Do remember, the name is Kudarat. I hope soon we will be close friends.
tradeRequest: May this offer interest you, my friend?
uniqueText:
Militaristic City-States grant units 2 times as fast when at war with a common nation 
+33% [Production] when constructing Defensive buildings in all cities
uniques: Militaristic City-States grant units [2] times as fast when you are at war with a common nation
[+33]% Production when constructing [Walls] buildings [in all cities]
[+33]% Production when constructing [Castle] buildings [in all cities]
[+33]% Production when constructing [Arsenal] buildings [in all cities]

name: Lanao Confederation
uniques: [+1 Food, +2 Production] [in all cities] <within [3] tiles of a [Lake]>

name: Sulu
startIntroPart2: Oh clever and virtuous Jamalul Kiram, will you rebuild Sulu and lead your people to even greater heights of glory? Will you take up the challenge and vanquish your foes under heaven's watchful eyes? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Your transgressions are as deep as oceans. Prepare for war!
attacked: I will not allow you to remain in power any longer. You have offended me for too long!
defeated: With God's help, may Sulu people one day reclaim its territory.
introduction: I am Jamulul Kiram, Sultan of Sulu. It is my great pleasure to finally meet you.
tradeRequest: Better hurry, I may change my mind.
uniqueText:
Free Worker appears upon constructing Courthouse
May sell Worker for 35 [Gold]
